parameters.name: ConnectSubType
parameters.description:
The sub-type of the connection. Valid values:

*   **vpc2vpc**: Express Connect connection
*   **vpcpeer**: peer connection

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: FirewallSwitchStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the VPC firewall. Valid values:

*   **opened**: The VPC firewall is enabled.
*   **closed**: The VPC firewall is disabled.
*   **notconfigured**: The VPC firewall is not configured.
*   **configured**: The VPC firewall is configured.

> If you do not specify this parameter, VPC firewalls in all states are queried.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: MemberUid
parameters.description: The UID of the member that is managed by your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: **10**.**** Maximum value: **50**.

parameters.name: PeerUid
parameters.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the peer VPC belongs.

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPC.

> For more information about the regions, see [Supported regions](~~195657~~).

parameters.name: VpcFirewallId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the VPC firewall.

parameters.name: VpcFirewallName
parameters.description: The instance name of the VPC firewall.
